name: Mag Projector, Basic (BMPj-11)
description: Basic version of the mag projector. The mag projector projects a high frequency magnetic effect onto the target. This rapid magnetic pulsing scrambles electronic circuits and induces temporary disorientation in organic beings. In addition, this weapon effect shuts down magnetic equipment.

name: Grav Projector (GrPj-12)
description: The grav projector projects a high frequency gravitic effect onto the target. The rapid gravitic pushing and pulling reduces internal structural strength in objects and induces organic damage in beings. In addition, this weapon effect shuts down grav equipment.

name: Anti-Designator Poison Gas Projector (aDPPj-12)
description: The anti-designator poison gas projector can sense the effects of a poison gas designator. The weapon can be set to automatically fire at the designator or wait for a manual command.

name: Poison Gas Projector, Disposable (DPPj-12)
description: Disposable version of the poison gas projector. The poison gas projector projects a cloud of poisonous gas at the target. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.
